ygData.subject: Re: Problem with Scen-Edit (nevermind I fixed it)
ygData.msgSnippet: Nevermind, people, I fixed it.  I feel like such a tard for not figuring this out years ago.  All I did was add the [scen] and [pix] directories.  I found out

Nevermind, people, I fixed it.  I feel like such a 'tard for not
figuring this out years ago.  All I did was add the [scen] and [pix]
directories.  I found out by looking through some of the README files.
 They mentioned that the absence of those two folders would make the
Scenario Editor not work.
